body_html: That's exactly the kind of decorator I was hoping for! Though that version is implementing a simplified form, the original weightnorm is implemented per-output-channel, not over the whole tensor (though I've found that whole-tensor is way more stable, personally <_<)

body: That's exactly the kind of decorator I was hoping for! Though that version is implementing a simplified form, the original weightnorm is implemented per-output-channel, not over the whole tensor (though I've found that whole-tensor is way more stable, personally <_<)
